```{r}
wages <- read.csv("Wages.csv")
```

```{r}
wages$FEMALE <- ifelse(wages$Gender == "female", 1, 0)

reg.1 <-lm(data=wages, WAGE ~ EDUCATION + EXPERIENCE + FEMALE + FEMALE*EXPERIENCE)
summary(reg.1)
```

```{r}
reg.1 <-lm(data=wages, WAGE ~ EDUCATION + EXPERIENCE + FEMALE + FEMALE*EXPERIENCE)
summary(reg.1)
```
